title: Keen Lego movie
content:
I recently purchased the commander keen combo cd for the 3drealms online store and had been enjoying the nostalgic goodness that is commander keen. My mom told me that I had been playing for well long enough and to get off the computer...so I retaliated...sorta...
SMALL: [url=http://www.postbrickfilms.com/yodablob/videogames_small.wmv]www.postbrickfilms.com/yo..._small.wmv[/url]
MEDIUM: [url=http://www.postbrickfilms.com/yodablob/videogames_medium.wmv]www.postbrickfilms.com/yo...medium.wmv[/url]
LARGE: [url=http://www.postbrickfilms.com/yodablob/videogames_large.wmv]www.postbrickfilms.com/yo..._large.wmv[/url]

Enjoy!

title: Re: Keen Lego movie
content:

title: ILUVLEGO!!!
content:
I just love Lego's; they're second only to keen. I should make a keen lego movie... first my 3 mods, fan-fic, then my movie. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img]

title: Program:
content:
What do you use to make these masterpeices (I just watched you other ones)?

I have SMA (Stop Motion Animator), what do you use?

-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Program:
content: stop motion animator is pretty good for animation.  You can edit them in windows movie maker (free).  I use a web cam to animate btw.
